title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Clay and Buck talk about Mountain Dew, well-done steaks, Buck's questionable past as a soccer dude. The NYC mayoral primary may be a tipping point for liberalism. Former police chiefs on crime wave across the country. Clay and Buck break down the New York mayoral race, which could be a tipping point for the defund the police movement.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
